fields.name: indicator
fields.description: Indicator estimated by the GAMLSS model in the KiGGS study. `cimt`: carotid intima-media thickness.

fields.name: sex
fields.description: Sex as an explanatory variable for the GAMLSS model; `f` : female, `m`: male

fields.name: ageY
fields.description: Age in years as an explanatory variable for the GAMLSS model

fields.name: height
fields.description: Height in cm as an explanatory variable for the GAMLSS model

fields.name: sigma
fields.description: GAMLSS model parameter: Approximate coefficient of variation

fields.name: lambda
fields.description: GAMLSS model parameter: Skewness/ Box-Cox Power Transformation
